line_1: He in crude Feasts his purpled Jaws embrues;
line_2: From the mixt Heaps will noblest Captives chuse,

line_1: He in crude Feasts his purpled Jaws embrues;
line_2: Let go the tastless Prey, and vulgar Treats refuse.

line_1: Alone in reeking blood his jaws embrues;
line_2: Alone the wanton mischief he pursues,
